eg.edittools

Interface AddableEditTool

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExchangeEditor, Finder

    public interface AddableEditTool
    The interface that defines an "edit tool" whose graphical view can be added to the EditToolPanel. This panel is positioned on the right of the splite pane in the main window. The graphical view of the edit tool is represented by a Component object.
    See Also:
    EditToolPanel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addClosingAction(FunctionalAction act)
      Sets the action for closing the EditToolPanel to this closing button.
      java.awt.Component content()
      Gets this Component
      void end()
      Ends the edit tool.
      boolean resize()
      Returns if the width of this Component is resized when the width of main window is resized.
      void setDocument(EditableDocument edtDoc)
      Sets the EditableDocument that is currently viewed in the editor
      int width()
      Returns the current width of this Component.

    • Method Detail

      • addClosingAction

        void addClosingAction(FunctionalAction act)
        Sets the action for closing the EditToolPanel to this closing button. The specified act contains the close icon
        Parameters:
        act - the action

      • width

        int width()
        Returns the current width of this Component. May define an initial width that is used when the component is added the first time.
        Returns:
        the width

      • resize

        boolean resize()
        Returns if the width of this Component is resized when the width of main window is resized.
        Returns:
        true to resize, false to maintain the width

      • content

        java.awt.Component content()
        Gets this Component
        Returns:
        the Component

      • setDocument

        void setDocument(EditableDocument edtDoc)
        Sets the EditableDocument that is currently viewed in the editor
        Parameters:
        edtDoc - the EditableDocument

      • end

        void end()
        Ends the edit tool. Called when the program is exited
